This is a graph of my ratings of fruit for today lol
``` {r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#Require plotly
library(plotly)
library(knitr)
graph <- plot_ly(
  x = c('Apple', 'Orange', 'Banana', 'Pineapple', 'Strawberry', 'Blueberry'),
  y = c(7, 8, 7.5, 6.5, 6, 8.5),
  name = "Fruits"
)

```
`r graph`
